name: Multiversal Betting Ranch
description:
Don't be fooled by me "Artistic" trickery. This game is utter garbage. For the GMTK 2020 GameJam.

You play as a man with many (6) monitors each having or not having a very neat 'ol universe on it. Your goal is to prune the timelines and hope luck goes your way... yeah.

wowzathis really does suck doesn't it.
